AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.intro: Here is a little background about me
AboutMe.description:
I am a dedicated and experienced Full-Stack Web Developer with a strong proficiency in TypeScript, React Js and node js frameworks (Koa, express) and diverse modern technologies and librairies besides Other than the basic knowledge i have in other languages : Python, C# and Java. and list of technologies i worked with. 
I have Experience in writing clean, maintainable code and optimizing existing codebases to improve performance and reduce load times. 
Besides Proven ability to develop and apply best practices to ensure efficient and scalable web solutions swiftly without compromising quality. Skilled in leveraging frameworks, libraries, and tools to accelerate development cycles while ensuring robust performance.
 My commitment to learning programming and my enthusiasm for software development drive since i was young help to gain more expertise and deliver high-quality code, user-focused hybrid applications.

skills.technicalProficiency: Technical Proficiency: Skilled in a diverse range of programming languages and technologies such as Java, Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and SQL, with a strong ability to learn and adapt to new tools.
skills.problemSolving: Problem-Solving Skills: Expert in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues, optimizing code performance, and implementing innovative solutions to enhance system efficiency and user experience.
skills.projectManagement: Project Management: Demonstrated ability to lead and collaborate on complex projects, utilizing Agile methodologies to ensure timely delivery and high-quality outcomes.

Internships.title: Intenrships
Internships.intro: I did 3 internships during my 3 years in my engineering education period

1.title: Engineer internship
1.description: Design and develop web application for end of study internship using Mern stack (Mongo,express,react,nodeJs ) and GraphQL Api and Apollo Client on Ui instead of classic Rest api. The project has focused on digital signage and creating visual content for presentation of advertisement and use dynamic templates and medias for posters .

2.title: Technician internship
2.description: Implement a mobile application with react native and typescript  using trip advisor api that make user choose his trip , plane , hotel , house , car and location to visit

3.title: Worker internship
3.description:
Integrate into professional corporate work
created an application in typescript that provide service that show the supplier point sales locations on maps and worked on development of a feature for managing purchases of customer network products after doing authentication

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description:
I worked on main application of visual content company in Typescript on different features and tasks , allowed me to gain hands-on experience with React and TypeScript for the front-end, and Node.js with Koa js for the back-end, tasks worked on like managing medias and upload them on AWS S3. 
I got  experience in writing clean, maintainable code and optimizing existing codebases to improve performance and reduce load times. Apply best practices to ensure efficient and scalable web solutions.
 Besides developping i work as tester sometimes to test some queries and mutations of graphql endpoint in server side

0.description: Work on main progressive web application in domain of advertising and digital signage that help user to manage medias and add presentations
